casebody.data:
Jonathan BRUNSON
v.
OFFICE OF THE TWELFTH JUDICIARY No. 155P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019. Jonathan E. Brunson, for Brunson, Jonathan. Jessica B. Helms, Associate Attorney General, for Office of the Twelfth Judiciary. Barry H. Bloch, Assistant Attorney General, for Office of the Twelfth Judiciary.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 29th of April 2019 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
